Text: Anyone got it to work? I've burned the .iso it to a DVD but the Wii don't recognizes the disc. First time this happens. I checked if it was the .iso that was corrupted with WinRAR and it says it is. Do I have to do something for it to work?

aw cmon

It worked on my NTSC Wii with Neogamma Beta 15 installed but There is no audio for the voices of the characters only the subtitles show.There is a song going on in english but no sound for the characters voices.Everything else works fine.
